meanings.definition: To fill with wonder or astonishment
meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: I am always amazed by the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog amazed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness amazed me like a bright shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist in the movie left me amazed.

meanings.definition: To cause great surprise or astonishment
meanings.sent1: The sudden appearance of a rainbow amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: She amazed her friends with her incredible singing talent.
meanings.sent3: The cat amazed us by solving the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed amazed me like a powerful storm.
meanings.sent5: The speed of the cheetah amazed the zoo visitors.
